name: Be The King: Palace Game
description:
Step into the Top of the empire with the strategy RPG Be The King! In Be the King, you can experience a vivid career of being a rising imperial official by acquiring power! To acquire more power, you will have a lot to do. Just come to join millions of other players around the world and start your journey in Be The King!

When playing this game, you can start your life with various kinds of Retainers and Confidants who will be greatly helpful in every aspect. Besides, you will have a chance to know different people. And that’s always a lot more fun for you to discover!

CLASSIC FEATURES:

Recruit & Upgrade Retainers
There are many Retainers of different talents and skills! As they get stronger, you will become greater over the empire and even fights and wars! 

Cherish Confidants
Encounter various kinds of Confidants who are willing to follow you and be cherished!

Raise Offspring
Enjoy the process of witnessing the growth of your children! After they grow up, you can become In-laws with others players by marrying your offspring.

Fight with Alliance
Join or build a powerful Alliance yourself, you can not only experience the fun and joy with Alliance, but also will get some Alliance rewards in the Alliance event.

Study in Academy
Only when you are powerful enough, you can get a seat to study in Academy. Imperial Jacket will be helpful for you.

Laundry & Exile
If you feel there are too many Confidants and Retainers, just feel free to exile your Confidants in the Laundry or your Retainers in the Exile system.

Trade all over the World
You can trade all over the world with money and intelligence, and gain some rewards back after that.

Chat without Barriers
There are built-in translation function in the chat channel, you can chat with people from all over the world freely without fearing the language barriers.

Win the glory title to reach the Top of the empire! Become a conqueror over the missions and explore new stories and resources.

Come and start the legend on your own!
